title: New Real Madrid Font?
content:
Hey guys, I got a bad feeling that this is a custom font. Does anybody know this font:

[http://img15.echo.cx/img15/4518/beckham236ww.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090530140833/http:/img15.echo.cx/img15/4518/beckham236ww.jpg "http://img15.echo.cx/img15/4518/beckham236ww.jpg")

[http://img15.echo.cx/img15/9315/zidane53na.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090530140833/http:/img15.echo.cx/img15/9315/zidane53na.jpg "http://img15.echo.cx/img15/9315/zidane53na.jpg")

Any help appreciated :)
author: Tim7

comments.content: Wow! That was amazingly fast! Thank you very much.
